import{atom}from"recoil";export var phaseState=atom({key:'phaseState',default:0//0: betting, 1: action, 2: shuffling, 3: draw, 4: result,
});export var moneyState=atom({key:'money',default:100});export var betState=atom({key:'bet',default:0});export var DeckState=atom({key:'Deck',default:[]});export var DhandState=atom({key:'Dhand',default:[]});export var PhandState=atom({key:'Phand',default:[]});export var DscoreState=atom({key:'Dscore',default:0});export var PscoreState=atom({key:'Pscore',default:0});export var informState=atom({key:'inform',default:''});
